seed_pair.known: Yes they had something important to discuss.
seed_pair.target: 是的，他们有重要的事情要讨论。

practice_phrases.known: They had a field.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有一个田地。

practice_phrases.known: They had some old friends.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有一些老朋友。

practice_phrases.known: They had something to discuss on Friday night.
practice_phrases.target: 他们星期五晚上有事情要讨论。

practice_phrases.known: They had something important to know about her.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有重要的事情要了解她。

practice_phrases.known: They had some old friends who wanted to go out on Friday night.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有一些星期五晚上想出去的老朋友。

practice_phrases.known: They had something to discuss when they needed to leave me on my own.
practice_phrases.target: 他们需要把我一个人留下的时候有事情要讨论。

practice_phrases.known: They had something important to discuss about what was happening a week ago around the field.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有重要的事情要讨论关于一周前田地周围发生了什么。

practice_phrases.known: They had some old friends who didn't want to know what was going to happen on Friday night.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有一些老朋友不想知道星期五晚上会发生什么。

practice_phrases.known: Even if they had something important to discuss, they didn't need to appear angry when they wanted to see some old friends.
practice_phrases.target: 即使他们有重要的事情要讨论，他们想见一些老朋友的时候不需要显得生气。

practice_phrases.known: They had some old friends who wanted to run around the field on Friday night, but they didn't want to leave me on my own.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有一些星期五晚上想绕着田地跑的老朋友，但是他们不想把我一个人留下。

practice_phrases.known: Something important.
practice_phrases.target: 重要的事情。

practice_phrases.known: They had something to discuss.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有事情要讨论。

practice_phrases.known: She wanted to know something about him.
practice_phrases.target: 她想知道关于他的一些事情。

practice_phrases.known: He needed to discuss something important on Friday night.
practice_phrases.target: 他星期五晚上需要讨论重要的事情。

practice_phrases.known: They had something important to discuss when they went out.
practice_phrases.target: 他们出去的时候有重要的事情要讨论。

practice_phrases.known: She didn't want to know something that was happening a week ago.
practice_phrases.target: 她不想知道一周前发生的一些事情。

practice_phrases.known: He wanted to discuss something important with some old friends on Friday night when he went out.
practice_phrases.target: 他星期五晚上出去的时候想和一些老朋友讨论重要的事情。

practice_phrases.known: They had something to discuss about that woman you know who appeared angry a week ago.
practice_phrases.target: 他们有事情要讨论关于你认识的一周前显得生气的那个女人。

practice_phrases.known: Even if she needed to discuss something important, she didn't want to leave me on my own on Friday night.
practice_phrases.target: 即使她需要讨论重要的事情，她星期五晚上不想把我一个人留下。

practice_phrases.known: He wanted to know if they had something important to discuss about what was happening with that woman you know a week ago.
practice_phrases.target: 他想知道他们是否有重要的事情要讨论关于一周前你认识的那个女人发生了什么。
